stories.title: The Tortoise and the Hare
stories.moral: Slow and steady wins the race
text: A hare once mocked a slow tortoise.
They decided to race each other.
The hare ran fast and fell asleep on the way.
The tortoise kept moving and won the race.

stories.title: The Lion and the Mouse
text: A lion caught a small mouse but let him go.
One day, the lion was trapped in a net.
The mouse came and gnawed the ropes.
The lion was free and thanked the mouse.

stories.title: The Clever Fox
stories.moral: Presence of mind helps in danger
text: A fox fell into a deep well.
He could not climb out.
A goat came near the well.
The fox tricked the goat and escaped.

stories.title: The Honest Woodcutter
text: A woodcutter dropped his axe into a river.
He cried because it was his only tool.
A fairy tested his honesty.
She rewarded him for telling the truth.

stories.title: The Monkey and the Crocodile
text: A monkey lived on a fruit tree near a river.
A crocodile became his friend.
The crocodile planned to kill the monkey.
The monkey used his intelligence and escaped.
